mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO movietb (movieno, movienm, movieen, moviebackimg, moviepostimg, movieyoutube, steelcut, releaseday,intro,ratingno, directornm, actor, genre, times) VALUES
(#{movie.movieno}, #{movie.movienm}, #{movie.movieen},#{movie.moviebackimg}, #{movie.moviepostimg}, #{movie.movieyoutube}, #{movie.steelcut},#{movie.releaseday},#{movie.intro},#{movie.ratingno},#{movie.directornm},#{movie.actor}, #{movie.genre}, #{movie.times})
mapper.select: SELECT movieno, movienm, directornm, DATE_FORMAT(releaseday, '%Y.%m.%d') as openday, ratingno, times, intro, moviebackimg, moviepostimg, movieyoutube, steelcut, genre, actor, salesAcc, audiAcc, ranking, status, typeNm, showType from boxofficetb order by ranking

SELECT movieno, movienm, movieen, directornm, DATE_FORMAT(releaseday, '%Y.%m.%d') as openday, endday, moviestatus, ratingno, times, intro, moviebackimg, moviepostimg, movieyoutube, steelcut, genre, actor from boxofficetb order by ranking

SELECT movieno, movienm, movieen, directornm, DATE_FORMAT(releaseday, '%Y.%m.%d') as openday, endday, moviestatus, ratingno, times, intro, moviebackimg, moviepostimg, movieyoutube, steelcut, genre, actor FROM movietb WHERE intro IS NOT NULL AND moviebackimg != '' AND moviepostimg != '' AND intro != '' AND releaseday <= NOW() ORDER BY ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), releaseday)) desc LIMIT 20

SELECT movieno, movienm, movieen, directornm, DATE_FORMAT(releaseday, '%Y.%m.%d') as openday, endday, moviestatus, ratingno, times, intro, moviebackimg, moviepostimg, movieyoutube, steelcut, genre, actor FROM movietb
WHERE intro IS NOT NULL AND moviebackimg != '' AND moviepostimg != '' AND intro != '' AND releaseday >= NOW() ORDER BY ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), releaseday)) ASC LIMIT 20
